logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Updated version to 5.2.0

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: AMCupdater: Updated Tooltip for "search expression for group names"

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Trakt Integration: Added "Lists ..." to Trakt Submenu - new translation: <String id="10798786">Show Lists ...</String>

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: AMCupdater - tweaks for Group Name Identifier

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Added button to open Hyperlink Creator to MF setup

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Added translation for "Sort by (Collection) .... -> <String id="1079905">Sort by (Collection) ...</String>

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Added Grabber scripts for IMDB.PL, MoviePilot, WoV Added default settings for several countries/languages (tnx Dadeo)

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Collection sort: moved settings to same position as normal sort - so when selecting "Always use that view" the setup options will be applied each time the plugin is entered - otherwise last used settings will remain. Thus it is more consistant with normal sort settings

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Fix for loadParams not being reset after being processed (thus always being applied again if returning from Details to Main) - tnx Dadeo for reporting

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Rework Startparameter Creator as asked by Dadeo

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Rework Startparameter Creator as asked by Dadeo

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Fixed search order for collections (ASC/DESC)

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Fix for Collection sort - now can be set via "sort button" if in collection "context"

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Added StartParameters as return string from public HypereLinkStartParams form to use it in e.g. BH editors

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: (Resolves issue #31) : Allow userdefined startparameter creation Add a button in setup to allow advanced users to create their own start parameters for usage as hyperlink on any buttons in MediaPortal skin, e.g. basic home, hidden menus, etc. Implemented as a new window with a button in MF setup.

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Tooltip typos fixed

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: AMCupdater: Updated default file with new option "Group Name Identifier"

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: AMCupdater: Added option "Group Name Identifier" to conditionally add matching folder names as group names. If empty, default behaviour is used. If enabled, only directory names with a match will be added.

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: fix for movie hierarchies sorting - to be optional and not activated, if no setting available

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: (Fixes issue #28) : Group Hierarchy Cover Added new setting for "sort behaviour in hierarchy groups/collections - so whenever you enter such a group, this setting will be used for sorting (instead of standard sorting).

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: (Fixes issue #29) : Group names in AMCupdater should depend on import type (Title and Search Handling): When importing "files", the containing folder should be returned as group name. When importing "folders" the parnet folder of the movie should be returned as group name.

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Fixed AMC4 schema - removal of unallowed constraints

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Fix for groupcount property (removed unnecessary chars)

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Minor logging change in BaseMesFilms Update BG skin

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: AMC4 schema changes (WIP)

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Added property "#myfilms.user.mastertitle.groupcount" for count of films in movie collections (hierarchies) - can be used to e.g. display as overlay on a (group) cover as hint about the number of films included - useful in views other than list view

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: fixed movie group fanart added movie group covers - have to be placed in cover folder with name = movie group name (jpg and png extensions supported)

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Fix for grabber script filter - always take function into consideration, when showing "all" - otherwise nonworking grabber scripts will be offered

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Added person scraping, (re)adding person infos for movies - WIP

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: fixed buttons and skin buttons for MyFilmsActorsInfo

logentry.msg: Removed XML Node from GrabberScript() class (not used)

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Changed required skininterface version to "1.0"

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Update tooltip for fanart (hint for restrictions)

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Fixed "get internet data" (="all") grabber script filter - was not displaying any supported script - tnx Dadeo for reprting Added default settings for grabber script filter for "en" and "de"

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Fixed trakt lists handling option

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Grabber scripts: search fix for allocine

logentry.msg: Add option dialog for global trailer search to choose if extended directoires should be included in search

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Fix for Grabber script MovieGoods - removed filter for only german covers. (filter can be set in "language filter" of regex returns)

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Fix for Trailer registration (new detection)

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Multi Cover Grabbing: fix for wrong naming, fix for exception in cover selection menu (tnx Nico for reporting)

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Fix for Trailersearch not registering trailers for titles containing ":" - tnx mpsam for reporting

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Set skininterfaceversion requirement to V2.5 for testing fixed skininterfaceversion xml reader

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Skin Versioncontrol: Changed format as requested by Dadeo: <settings> <skininterfaceversion> <version> <major>1</major> <minor>0</minor> <build>0</build> <revision>0</revision> </version> </skininterfaceversion> </settings>

logentry.msg: Grabber script: fixed cinefacts-BR (wrong search display when no BR found)

logentry.msg: Rework of MF GUI grabbing / internet updates part 3 - added cover options to normal mode; refactoring of title handling

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Frabber Interace: minor GUI redesign to better match with new parameters

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: (Resolves issue #16) : Option in Setup to Select which Grabbers display - added new class GabberScript and added handling for it - new MF setup option to define languages to display

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Updated grabber scripts to match new extended handling

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: updated MediaInfo to V0.7.50

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Extended grabber array from 30 to 40 - adapted MyFilms, grabber and AMCupdater to support it (preparation for etended key-value-fields) Extended Grabber Interface to support extended key-value grabbing

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Grabber: fix for movie searches - regex expression length was not handled properly Grabber & GrabberInterface: Added Global paramaters "language", "version" and "type" for use with selections/filtering on grabber scripts in GUI Grabber & GrabberInterface: Added Thumb to movie results to allow user to check, of poster is available SampleGrabber script: added new fields and prepared for additional details (posters, personimages, etc.)

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Fix for manual deletion option (issue 19) and update translation files ('warning' added)

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: AMCupdater: Added "Source" to selectable DB fields to allow to disable/enable source updates (requires recreation of AMCupdater config)

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Fixed Installer - did not autoupdate an adding language translations Added missing translations

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: (Resolves issue #26) : Updated language files

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: (Resolves issue #26) : Always display 'Delete' option in context menu Added delete menu with 3 sub choices: remove from db, delete file(s), both

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: IMDB-Full script: added "UK" to title language/country selection

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: AMCupdater: fixed year parsing exception when grabber couldn't get year fexed log message "Updated: " for 'Update Movies'

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Grabber engine: Changed Cover loader to use memory cache - should avoid broken images and allows to better update existing images (and confitions)

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: fix typo in hyperlink creation in editor API sample implementation

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Added warning in MyFiolms setup, if user activates global filter "show only available movies", but did NOT activate "scan media on start" - as this would never allow to get that filtered view, unless the user launches it manually from the GUI, global options

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Fixed that no movies were displayed, if 'only show available' is selected as atartup option. THis was caused due to required runtime of the backgroundscanner - new behaviour is: First show all, if scanner finished, activate "show only available" global filter

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Fixed editor API sample implementation (wrong translation) on others tab

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: fixed grabber scripts IMDB and IMDB-Full rating (website change)

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: (Resolves issue #13) : Limits for fanart downloader - added GUI options to AMCupdater for resolution min/max and number limits implements feature to use grabber with settings accordingly added new settings to AMCupdater settings file

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: (Resolves issue #13) : Limits for fanart downloader - added resolution min/max and number limits to grabber engine

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Added output field to BasicHome editor test page - so users can create and use their own hyperlinks manually for skin buttons. (test mode only)

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Added test area on tab "others" and sample code for BasicHome editors for handling config, view and viewvalue startparams

logentry.msg: fixed userdefined views on startup (loadparams or defaultconfig)

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: fixed API handling for GetConfigViewLists() and GetViewListValues()

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Add sanity check for startparameter "layout"

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Fixed startparameter "search" - usage: 'search:<searchexpression>' where searchexpression is the parameter used for global search

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Fixed parsing error in startparameter "layout"

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Fixed startparameter "layout" - usage: 'layout:x' where x is the layout type (0 = list, 1 = thumb, etc.)

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Fixed StartParameter viewvalue to be properly set Fixed StartParameters not properly processed after first start

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: AMCupdater: fix for AMCupdater creating empty directories on movie root drive, if no fanart path is set - tnx foxbenw for reporting

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Added MovieMaze grabber script to get german covers, description, comment (works only with proper german titles, as it uses google search for searching with name only

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: MyFilms: fixed sanity check of User defined config filter "and/or"

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: Improved tooltip for 'Userdefined Config Filters'

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: AMCupdater: Added more sanity checks for falsely added 'ifo' and 'bdmv' extensions to media and nonmedia tapes

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: AMCupdater: fix: When "Item for storage file handling" was other than "Source", selecting Database fields could select the same field for updating and thus overwriting media source info. -> For button selects, the current storage field is now excluded; when manually selecting the same field a warning sign is given to the user.

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: MyFilms: Fixed playback of BR-folders (index.bdmv) with BDHandler Added check if BDHandler is installed and active

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: (Fixes issue #21) : AMCupdater doesn't add BR rips (folders) - also added "best guess" media info retrieval for DVD and BR folders

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: AMCupdater: Fixed proper BR-folder detection and search title retrival; remove "BACKUP" from result list

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
logentry.msg: (Resolves issue #19) : Enable PlayMusic button ('p' key) in Main and Details window

logentry.author: Iggo Gunzelmann
